rev.desc.rev.desc: correct the parameter of panel of call.cm3r.main, set background is true
panel of call.cm3r.main is missing, added it back
Remove unlock errror message from cm3r.unlock whe the RAD is called by cm3.last.task.process
QCCR1E68080- Changes for Last Task Processing

Change:Added the following expressions:$L.close=jscall("security.getRights", "Change", "update")$L.pos=index("Change", areas in $G.roleRights)if ($L.pos=0) then ($L.pos=1)1 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"2 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"3 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="always"4 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="always"6 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"7 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"view in $G.cm3r.environment=trueupdate in $G.cm3r.environment="always"new in $G.cm3r.environment=trueclose in $G.cm3r.environment=truePanel: setup.process

Change:Changed the exit from "call.cm3r.main" to "call.engine"Changed the following expressions from:$L.action="update"if nullsub(2 in booleans in $L.sched, false) then ($L.action="close")To:$L.action="save"if nullsub(2 in booleans in $L.sched, false) then ($L.action=$L.transition)Panel: start
Change:Added the following expression:$L.transition=5 in strings in $L.schedPanel: check.change.phase
Change:Changed the exit from "impersonate" to "set.env.close"Panel: impersonate
Change processor was looping when it could not unlock a record.
Change processor will now impersonate the person who closed the task and always have the ability to close the change.
Changed start to set up $L.give.up.msg by passing in 3 in strings in $L.sched as the change number
Changed get.change.query to set $L.query to the query set in the schedule record. Updated setup.resched to reset the class if the auto close needs to be rescheduled.
Will check the expected parent phase to determine if it should continue or not.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

descript.descript: correct the parameter of panel of call.cm3r.main, set background is true
panel of call.cm3r.main is missing, added it back
Remove unlock errror message from cm3r.unlock whe the RAD is called by cm3.last.task.process
QCCR1E68080- Changes for Last Task Processing

Change:Added the following expressions:$L.close=jscall("security.getRights", "Change", "update")$L.pos=index("Change", areas in $G.roleRights)if ($L.pos=0) then ($L.pos=1)1 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"2 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"3 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="always"4 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="always"6 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"7 in 4 in $L.pos in areas in $G.roleRights="true"view in $G.cm3r.environment=trueupdate in $G.cm3r.environment="always"new in $G.cm3r.environment=trueclose in $G.cm3r.environment=truePanel: setup.process

Change:Changed the exit from "call.cm3r.main" to "call.engine"Changed the following expressions from:$L.action="update"if nullsub(2 in booleans in $L.sched, false) then ($L.action="close")To:$L.action="save"if nullsub(2 in booleans in $L.sched, false) then ($L.action=$L.transition)Panel: start
Change:Added the following expression:$L.transition=5 in strings in $L.schedPanel: check.change.phase
Change:Changed the exit from "impersonate" to "set.env.close"Panel: impersonate
Change:Removed unused panelChange processor was looping when it could not unlock a record.
Change processor will now impersonate the person who closed the task and always have the ability to close the change.
Changed start to set up $L.give.up.msg by passing in 3 in strings in $L.sched as the change number
Changed get.change.query to set $L.query to the query set in the schedule record. Updated setup.resched to reset the class if the auto close needs to be rescheduled.
Will check the expected parent phase to determine if it should continue or not.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
